# Outline
The workshop will give you experience in:

-   Installing Condes onto your device (if required)
-   Importing a map ready to plan your course
-   Using the course planning tools to set a course (put the circles, lines, other information onto the printed map)
-   Laying out a course map ready for printing
-   Exporting data files and map files
